title: Get Property List Request
description: Request parameters for retrieving a property list with resolved identifiers

list_id.description: ID of the property list to retrieve

resolve.description: Whether to apply filters and return resolved identifiers (default: true)

pagination.description: Pagination parameters. Uses higher limits than standard pagination because property lists can contain tens of thousands of identifiers.

max_results.description: Maximum number of identifiers to return per page

cursor.description: Opaque cursor from a previous response to fetch the next page
